des:
Ask Alexa to control the devices and scenes that are connected to your Fernsby Smart Home.

Getting Started

1. To add the Fernsby Smart Home Skill to Alexa, go to the Alexa mobile app.
2. From the menu, select Skills
3. Search for ‘Fernsby Smart Home’ skill and then select Enable
4. You will be redirected to smarthome.fernsby.com. Login with your Fernsby Smart Home credentials
5. Select all the devices you would like Alexa to control then select Finish. Note: You can enter custom names for each device (e.g. Front porch light). Do not use any special characters when customizing device names.
6. After the account is linked, the following message will appear: ‘Fernsby Smart Home has been successfully linked.’
7. Go to Smart Home and then select Discover or ask Alexa to ‘Discover my devices’. This can take up to 20 seconds.
8. Once you see your discovered devices the set-up is complete!

For support connecting your Fernsby Smart Home to Alexa, contact smarthomesupport@fernsby.com
